directions: In a large saucepan, combine the cream of shrimp soup, cream of mushroom soup, canned shrimp and cheese. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until cheese is melted and well blended. Serve on cocktail rye slices.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of shrimp soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed
title: Shrimp Fondue
